name: You Don't Know the Half of It: Fins of the Father
name_original: You Don't Know the Half of It: Fins of the Father
description:
Welcome to the big race, Salmontha; this is the one you've been working for. It's the race that ended your father 7 years ago. Now you can finally make peace. Are you ready?

Music video(game) featuring Sigma - Nobody To Love

Heavilly inspired by Kanye - Bound 2

"Sometimes words aren't enough." - Rock, Paper, Shotgun

Featured on WarpDoor

Shown at Different Games Conference

Game 63 of 100 in 5 years
